content.get_rest_witty_creatures: HOW TO GET THE WITTY CREATURES THAT YOU ARE MISSING
content.anouncements_date_1_text: Come to our booth at Level-1 to get your first 3 witty creatures
content.get_first_creatures_text: Show up at the 'Witnet Decentralized Oracle Network' booth on Level-1 (downstairs on the left from the building entrance) adn talk to any of the Witnet community members there to receive your first 3 witty creatures.
content.get_rest_witty_creatures_3_0: When exchanging cards with other players, please apply reasonable social distancing and higiene measures
content.what_is_witnet_text: Just as this game brings NFTs to the physical world, the Witnet decentralized oracle network brings all kind of data from the real world to the Jblockchain world without compromising the data integrity and trustlessness of the consumer smart contracts. +Info at {0}
content.instruction_1: {0} This is an off-chain {1} - the precursors of NFTs.
content.instruction_2: {0} There are {1} of premium, gold plated PCB cards in the game.
content.instruction_3: {0} Each card has a different cute and {1} on its front side.
content.instruction_4: {0} Each card has {1} written in fine print on the bottom of its front side.
content.instruction_5: {0} These {1} are part of one or more {2} (BIP-39 mnemonics).
content.instruction_6: {0} These backup phrases unlock {1} with generous prizes deposited on them.
content.instruction_7: {0} These words can also be loaded into the {1} app ({2}) to receive additional prizes in {3}.
content.instruction_8: {0} There are 3 bronze prizes ({1} each), 2 silver prizes ({2} each) and 1 gold prize ({3}).
content.instruction_9: {0} If you want to discover all the 36 secret words in the game, {1} - you will need to exange them with other players.
content.instruction_10: {0} Use the {1} below to write down the secret words found in each of the cards that you collect.
content.instruction_11: {0} To reconstruct the backup secret phrases from the individual words and claim the prices, simply follow the {1} below.
content.instruction_12: {0} As soon as you have collected {1} needed for a prize, make sure to load them into your favorite wallet software and transfer all the available balance to your own Ethereum or Witnet wallet.
content.instruction_13: {0} You can track which prizes have been taken and which are still standing.
content.get_rest_witty_creatures_1: - This time around, {0}. You will initially be given only 3 crypto creatures, so if you want to be the first to catch em'all and win one of the prizes, you'd better find other players and exchange your cards with them.
content.get_rest_witty_creatures_2: - Use {0} hashtag in Twitter to easily find other players and to publish your creature exchange offers.
content.get_rest_witty_creatures_3: - Sadly, the COVID-19 pandemics is not over. {0}. The cards can be easily cleaned with hydroalcoholic gel or washed with regular hand soap and rinsed with water.
